page.title: 19THE MOSQUE ASHTON
page.content: The original{Christian}church was built 87 years ago.In May, 1985 it is being changed into a{mosque}.Muslims and anyone who wants to know about Islam can go to the mosque.The mosque will be open at least five times a week. The muslims have a book called the {Quran}it is their holy book.There is a washroom for purifing yourself to make yourselves clean.Muslims can only worship God if their body is clean.The people who come to the mosque remove their shoes because if they have stepped on any dirt they would tread it onto the carpet which people sit down on. The special days for the muslim people to go to the mosque are the Friday prayer, wedding's and funerals. The Muslim christmas is called Eid.
